attributes.action: Save the Leeds Deaf Social Club in Centenary House
attributes.additional_details:
The Deaf Community in Leeds are about to lose their social club we need help to ensure that the community can continue to exist as it is vital for their identity. The Deaf community need a place to meet centrally in Leeds to open it up to all the people of Leeds and beyond.
The actions we want the government to take are:
- Provide a space in the centre of Leeds which offers parking and easy access for the deaf people of Leeds by one bus.
- A place big enough to hold bingo, have to ability to serve food and a bar area.
- Accessible for all
- Run by the deaf community for the deaf community
